attributes.action: Legislate to reduce, by at least 50%, the amount of energy used on street lighting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Urban roads and motorways, unpopulated city centres, residential streets, shopping centre car parks, parks and amenity areas are all examples of areas that are unnecessarily illuminated from dusk to dawn. It is our view that we must turn off a considerable amount of lighting in unpopulated areas and make major reductions to the levels in populated areas, after, say, 23.00 hours.  Every situation, every lamp should be assessed on a real needs basis in consultation with residents, user groups etc. Public safety must remain a priority for a realistic/popular outcome.
